Databricks - https://databricks.com/ - San Francisco, CA - Frontend, backend, site reliability engineers

Databricks is building a cloud platform that makes data science simple. We are founded by the team that created Apache Spark, and are dedicated to the open source development of Spark.

Frontend / Full stack engineers: focused on providing a feature rich notebook that enhances the user's experience with Spark. Working with React, Backbone, d3, new and creative visualizations, and improving the way people work with big data is what we do.

We are also hiring for other software engineering positions. Experience with scala and working knowledge of distributed systems is a major plus!

https://databricks.com/company/careers

If you have any questions feel free to email me directly at chris@databricks.com
